note.text: Game start delayed from 8:01 to 8:06pm due to storms.
Teams warmed up for 20 minutes prior to kick.

play.text: Tonight's Forecast: Showers, isolated t'storms.

comment.text: NC State wins the toss and defers to the second half.
Virginia Tech will receive and defend the North goal.
